title: Ticket #1737: Multi-Proc parallel jobs have multiple submit events per job in the us
description:
Parallel jobs with multiple procs should have one submit event. When submit event writing moved to the schedd, this broke parallel jobs: 

universe = parallel
executable = test.sh

log    = log

machine_count = 1
queue
machine_count = 1
queue

the log file ends up looking like: 

000 (927.000.000) 10/27 09:50:42 Job submitted from host: <128.105.121.33:42616>
...
000 (927.001.000) 10/27 09:50:42 Job submitted from host: <128.105.121.33:42616>
...
014 (927.000.000) 10/27 09:50:44 Node 0 executing on host: <128.105.121.33:50520>
...
014 (927.000.001) 10/27 09:50:44 Node 1 executing on host: <128.105.121.33:50520>
...
001 (927.000.000) 10/27 09:50:44 Job executing on host: MPI_job
...
remarks:
2011-Jan-27 14:50:47 by danb:
Bulk change of target version from v070505 to v070506 using ./ticket-target-mover.
2011-Feb-01 16:20:02 by tannenba:
Bulk change of target version from v070506 to NULL using ./ticket-target-mover.
